plot: Captain Picard and Dr. Crusher discover things about one another when they are captured by an opposing alien race, due to the fact that the Enterprise has come to allow the planet's other civilization the choice of being part of the Federation.—Matthew Olson

The Enterprise travels to Kesprytt III, where the majority Kes race requests associated Federation membership but not the secluded, xenophobic Prytt. Instead of beaming Kes ambassador Mauric aboard, Picard wakes up incarcerated with Dr. Crusher, both fitted by the Prytt (who fear a military Kes-Federation alliance against them) with an implant communicating their thoughts to each other, so they intensely examine their relationship. This forces the pair to stay close after they find and follow escape clues delivered by undercover Kes operatives. Denied diplomacy by the Prytt, Commander Riker invites Mauric's help, but he sets up shop aboard with suspicious paranoia, while promising to extract the hostages.—KGF Vissers
